General.Name: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited
General.Description: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, Fund Management, and Investment Trading. The company provides securities and derivatives brokering services for local and foreign investors; investment advisory; security underwriting; securities borrowing and lending; venture capital management; financial advisory; and private, derivatives, and mutual fund management services. It also invests in unit trusts; and buys, sells, and exchanges securities. The company was formerly known as Asia Plus Group Holdings Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited in July 2015. Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
